title: My Chat won't reconnect?
body: I was just playing about 45 minutes ago, and stepped away. Came back to computer and suddenly I can't reconnect my chat? RITO PLS

replies.body:
Hey Sasutachi! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
Same. I was also unable to reconnect to a game recently too. Now chat hasn't worked for about a day.
Same, they need to fix this,
